name: 李瑞元
objective: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
schedule:
Weeks 1, 2: Introduction
Week 3: Physical Properties of Pure Compounds
Weeks 4, 5: Material and Energy Balances
Week 6: Entropy
Week 7: Thermodynamic Processes and Cycles
Week 8: Equations of State
Week 9: Mid-term Exam
Week 10, 11: Phase Equilibrium for Pure Components
Week 12: Mixtures
Weeks 13, 14: Vapour-liquid Equilibrium
Weeks 15, 16: Theories and Models for VLE of mixtures
Week 17: LLE, VLLE and SLE
Week 18: Final Exam
materials: Kevin D Dahm and Donald P Visco Jr. Fundamentals of Chemical Engineering Thermodynamics, SI Edition. CENGAGE Learning 2015.
